release.action: Added a gadget panel that allows Google Gadgets or Open Social Gadgets to be embedded in a Simal page. At present this requires a gadget server to be running at localhost:8888/gadgets with the necessary javascript files in localhost:8888/gadgets/files/container. The easiest way to make this happen is to checkout Shindig and run "mvn -Djetty.port=8888 jetty:run". It is intended to remove this requirement at some point in the future, see ISSUE 83 to track progress.
